name: IOUserNetworkPacketBufferPool
desc: An object that manages the storage space for packets coming into and out of your driver.

items.name: + Create
items.desc: Creates a new packet buffer pool object and allocates space for the specified number of packets.

items.name: - init
items.desc: Initializes the network packet buffer pool object.

items.name: - free
items.desc: Releases the resources owned by the network packet buffer pool object.

items.name: - GetBufferCount
items.desc: Returns the number of buffers associated with the network packet buffer pool.

items.name: - GetPacketCount
items.desc: Returns the number of network packets that the pool is capable of storing.

items.name: - DeallocatePacket
items.desc: Disposes of any resources associated with the packet and makes the packet available for reuse.

items.name: - DeallocatePackets
items.desc: Disposes of any resources associated with the specified packets and makes them available for reuse.

items.name: - CopyMemoryDescriptor
items.desc: Returns a memory descriptor for the buffer pool's contents.
